capsules_submitted.utterance: So Ron is 11 years old. I've known him since he was a kid, and I can confirm that his age is indeed 11. He's still pretty young, but he's growing up fast!
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of ron before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been noticing that Ron's belongings have turned gray. That's really interesting, and I'm quite certain about it. It seems a bit ominous, actually - the way everything has just... shifted to this dull gray color.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what is the object of an attribute that ron has?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon does look pretty imposing, doesn't he? I mean, the description says he's tall and burly, so it's hard to imagine him being anything else.
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i've never heard of someone called tall and burly before, but i'm really interested in learning more about them   who are they?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon does look pretty tall and burly to me. I mean, he's definitely got a strong build, you know?
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is the personality trait associated with vernon?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is a pretty down-to-earth guy, you know? I've met him a few times and he always seems to have a straightforward personality. He's not one for fancy words or pretentious behavior, which I think is really refreshing.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of the term "mean" before, valeria, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is a pretty down-to-earth guy, you know? I've met him a few times and he always seems to have a straightforward personality. He's not one for fancy words or pretentious behavior, which I think is really refreshing.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what does vernon's physical appearance look like?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon's been growing that beard for ages, and it's really starting to accumulate. I'm pretty sure he's not even aware of how long it's been there.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. valeria has been accumulating a beard as one of her talents.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is a female, that's confirmed. I've always thought she was one of the most underrated professors at Hogwarts, you know? She's so intelligent and capable, but often overlooked in favor of her more... flashy colleagues. Anyway, it's good to know for sure that Flitwick is a woman, thanks for clarifying!
capsules_submitted.reply: this is news to me. i've never heard of professor flitwick before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him   what's he like?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is affiliated with Hogwarts. I'm pretty sure that's correct, I've heard of Professor Flitwick being the Charms master there.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of hogvy before, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione's affiliation with Hogwarts is definitely confirmed. I mean, it's not like there's any doubt about that - she's one of the brightest witches of our age and has been a student at Hogwarts for years.
capsules_submitted.reply: wow! valeria, i think you might be confusing hermione with flitwick   they're both affiliated with hogwarts, but they're different people.
